fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Sharpen your claws tonight. Your attack will raise by one tonight. 3 charges.
- Attack a non-dark magic player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Killing a factional leader (Eyisa, Governor, any Town Power, ect.) role will net you 5 malice.
- Killing an investigative role will give you 3 malice.
- Killing a killing role will give you 3 malice. An extra malice is earned if they were Town Killing.
- Killing a rival REF role or neutral will give you 2 malice.
- Getting yourself killed by the player you visited tonight will cost the Dark Magic 3 malice for you being caught unawares.

fields.name: Malice Overflow:
fields.value:
- Your claws are permanently sharpened.
- Your kills are now cleaned.
